Package TicketPackage.PlanePackage

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
TicketPackage.PlanePackage.Plane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Plane
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Stores information about a plane

Melissa Melaugh Created on: 25/11/2020 Updated on: 29/11/2020 AirportCheckIn:TicketPackage.PlanePackage:Plane

  • Constructor Details

    • Plane

      public Plane()
      The default constructor, makes a plane for a Wednesday in March. (The default price)

    • Plane

      public Plane​(int month, int weekday, java.lang.String departureDate)
      This is the complex constructor that initialises everything
      Parameters:
      month - the month, zero indexed, that the plane is to be created for
      weekday - the day of the week
      departureDate - the departure date in year-month-day format.

  • Method Details

    • takeSeat

      public void takeSeat​(java.lang.String seat) throws java.lang.Exception
      This method moves an available seat from the available seat list to the taken seat list if its available
      Parameters:
      seat - the seat the passenger wishes to take
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the seat is unavailable

    • showAvailableSeats

      public void showAvailableSeats()
      Prints out the full list of the available seats.

    • addAdult

      public void addAdult​(Adult adult)
      Adds an adult to the adults list.
      Parameters:
      adult - the adult to add to the plane

    • addChild

      public void addChild​(Child child)
      Adds a child to the children list.
      Parameters:
      child - the child to add to the plane

    • addSenior

      public void addSenior​(Senior senior)
      Adds a senior to the seniors list.
      Parameters:
      senior - the senior to add to the plane

    • getChildPrice

      public double getChildPrice()
      Gets the price of the child for this plane
      Returns:
      a double representing the price of a child seat

    • getAdultPrice

      public double getAdultPrice()
      Gets the price of the adult for this plane
      Returns:
      a double representing the price of an adult's seat

    • getSeniorPrice

      public double getSeniorPrice()
      Gets the price of the senior for this plane
      Returns:
      a double representing the price of a senior's ticket

    • getDepartureDate

      public java.lang.String getDepartureDate()
      This method returns a string representing the departure date of the plane
      Returns:
      a string representing the departure date in year-month-day format

    • createWeekdayVariations

      private static double[][][] createWeekdayVariations()
      Create the different prices for every month and weekday within the month
      Returns:
      the price variations

    • createSeatingChart

      private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> createSeatingChart()
      Creates a seating chart from the finals ROWS and COLUMNS - making sure each row and column are even
      Returns:
      the full seating chart in ArrayList format.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method returns a string that allows the plane to be human readable and informative.
